message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your expectations.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but the value of this product to me is quite high. I could consider letting it go for $11,000. This feels like a fair compromise.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. However, based on my budget constraints, I am comfortable to pay up to $10,500 for this product. I hope this revised offer aligns with your considerations.
